Dear Isabelle-Community,

We are hiring theorem proving experts in Munich. If developing formal proofs of key software systems is your thing, please get in touch!

You find the job description here:
https://jobs.apple.com/en-us/details/200311498/software-formal-verification-engineer?team=HRDWR <https://jobs.apple.com/en-us/details/200311498/software-formal-verification-engineer?team=HRDWR>

Best,
Johannes
